Workflow.Name: [Entity Risk] Create or Update Operation Activity Risk Score
Workflow.Description: This is a flow that triggers when a record is created in the Entity Risk table (ts_entityrisk). What happens is the flow determines what Operation Activity the Entity Risk is related to. Then depending on what Fiscal Year the Entity Risk has, it will create an Operation Activity Risk Scores record if there is none for the Fiscal Year. Otherwise it will update the Operation Activity Risk Scores record that has the same Fiscal Year.
